member.name: T:SiliconStudio.ParadoxVersion
member.summary: Internal version used to identify Paradox version.
member.remarks: Note: When modifying the version here, it must be modified also in the Paradox.pdxpkg

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.ParadoxVersion.CurrentAssemblyAsText
member.summary: The .NET current assembly version as text, not including pre-release (alpha, beta...) information.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.ParadoxVersion.CurrentAsText
member.summary: The Store current version as text, including pre-release (alpha, beta...) information
member.remarks: Version number as described in http://docs.nuget.org/docs/reference/versioning When using pre-release (alpha, beta, rc...etc.) and because the order of the release is in alphabetical order, please use a double digit like alpha00 alpha01...etc. in order to make sure that we will follow the correct order for the versions.

member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.summary: Runs the specified main loop for the specified windows form.
member.param: if set to true indicating whether the render loop should use the default instead of a custom window message loop lightweight for GC. Default is false.

member.name: P:SiliconStudio.Paradox.Games.WindowsMessageLoop.Control
member.summary: Gets or sets the control to associate with the current render loop.

member.name: P:SiliconStudio.Paradox.Games.WindowsMessageLoop.UseApplicationDoEvents
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the render loop should use the default instead of a custom window message loop lightweight for GC. Default is false.
member.value: true if the render loop should use the default instead of a custom window message loop (default false); otherwise, false.
member.remarks: By default, RenderLoop is using a custom window message loop that is more lightweight than to process windows event message. Set this parameter to true to use the default .
